title: Himi 334
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
Sīsū, koe ‘Eiki Tauhi
Koe, ki he fanga sipi,
Pea ‘oku ‘o’ou ‘Eiki,
‘A e kakai ‘o māmani,
Pea ‘oku ‘i ho ‘ao,
‘A e lelei mo e kovi.
2.
Kapau ‘oku ai ha kovi
‘Oku lilo ‘iate au;
Ko e ‘ofa ki māmani,
Pe ki ha kovi ‘e taha,
Ke ke ta’akifu’u hake,
Mo ke teu’i mo’oni au.
3.
Ke langi’i ‘eku ‘ofa,
‘E he ‘ofa ‘a Kalaisi;
Pea u ngāue loto ‘ofa,
Ke u ma’u honau laumālie,
Ke nau ‘i he ‘Afiona,
Ko honau tauhi totonu. *
